title: Prof. Dr. med. Nidal Toman
subtitle: Plastic surgeon and specialist for plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery.
description:
Dr Nidal TOMAN, M.D., is an influential person with high connectedness in the field of medicine. He is a renowned expert in psychophysiology and plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery. Upon his graduation from Humboldt Universität zu Berlin, he started his career as an assistant doctor at Schlossparkklinik, Berlin in the Department of plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery. Later, he continued his career in DRK Clinic, Westend, Berlin in the Departments of plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery and the Migraine Surgery Centre.
In 2008, Dr Toman obtained the title of “Specialist in Plastic-Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery”. Later in that year, he was appointed as the “Head of The Centre for Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery” at the DRK clinics in Berlin, making him the youngest Chief of Medicine in the world. Until 2016, Dr Toman worked as “Head of Department of Plastic and Aesthetic Surgery” in various hospitals in Berlin Germany.

Dr Nidal TOMAN, M.D. wrote his PhD thesis in the Centre for Space and Aviation Medicine Berlin, a department connected to the Department of Physiology of the FU Berlin which formed a close cooperation with the ESA and NASA.
His theses led him to become a prominent and notable expert in the field of psychophysiology. In journalism and media, he is cited often and interviewed by numerous prestigious journals such as Morgenpost, Welt, Zeit and many more.

It is important for me to achieve the best possible and natural results with healthy recovery phases for my patients through the most modern treatment methods and scar-saving surgical techniques.
At numerous national and international congresses, I was constantly educated about current and modern procedures in plastic and aesthetic surgery.
I would be happy to inform you in an exclusive atmosphere about the latest developments and forms of treatment in the field of aesthetic medicine and take a lot of time for your concerns and wishes.
I look forward to meeting you!
